item.title: WOW Summit Hong Kong 2024 Concludes In Triumph, Cementing Its Position As A Blockchain Powerhouse
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。WOW Summit Hong Kong 2024是一次取得巨大成功的全球Web3活动，聚集了来自30多个国家的区块链专家、行业领袖和数字资产领域的未来建设者。峰会展示了行业的活力和创新，巩固了其作为顶级全球活动的地位。

The recently concluded WOW Summit Hong Kong 2024 (March 26-27) emerged as a resounding success, solidifying its place as a premier global Web3 event. WOW Summit Hong Kong brought together blockchain luminaries, industry leaders, and the future architects of the digital asset space from over 30 countries, showcasing the industry’s energy and innovation. The summit’s […]

The post WOW Summit Hong Kong 2024 Concludes In Triumph, Cementing Its Position As A Blockchain Powerhouse first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: Foresight Daily
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章的五个主要要点分别是：1. AI在医疗领域具有巨大潜力，可以提高医疗诊断的准确性；2. AI可以帮助研究人员快速分析大量的医疗数据，提供更准确的治疗方案；3. AI在监测病人健康状况和预防疾病方面有很大的应用前景；4. AI还可以帮助医生更好地管理药物，减少药物错误用药的风险；5. AI还可以提高医疗保健系统的效率，降低医疗成本。

item.title: DeMR: Pioneering the Path to a Billion-Dollar Business Empire Fusing Virtuality and Reality
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。文章介绍了DePIN和混合现实技术的结合将引发一场革命。这些技术的融合承诺为移动现实图像网络提供更加引人入胜、实时和准确的数据和服务。作为一个全球抱负的新兴基础设施运动，DePIN通过交织用户体验重新定义了手机现实图像网络。

Author: Andrew @dr_andrewlaw The recent buzz around DePIN and Mixed Reality (MR) technology is poised to ignite a revolution. The fusion of these technologies promises to deliver more engaging, real-time, and accurate data and services for mobile reality imaging networks. As a burgeoning infrastructure movement with a global ambition, DePIN redefines user experience by intertwining […]

The post DeMR: Pioneering the Path to a Billion-Dollar Business Empire Fusing Virtuality and Reality first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: Bitget Wallet Integrates Degen Chain Mainnet for Simplified Access
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。Bitget钱包现在整合了Degen Chain主网，用户只需点击一次即可搜索和访问Degen Chain主网。钱包的DApp浏览器还扩展了对Degen Chain的支持，包括跨链桥梁、去中心化交易所和市场工具，从而促进用户探索Degen Chain生态系统中的新机会。支持超过100种加密货币。

Bitget Wallet now integrates Degen Chain mainnet, enabling users to search for and access Degen Chain mainnet with a single click. The wallet’s DApp browser has also expanded its support to include Degen Chain’s cross-chain bridges, DEXs, and market tools, thereby facilitating user exploration of emerging opportunities within the Degen Chain ecosystem. Supporting over 100 […]

The post Bitget Wallet Integrates Degen Chain Mainnet for Simplified Access first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: MerlinSwap Breaks $100 Million in TVL and $70 Million in Daily Transaction Volume
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。MerlinSwap是Merlin Chain的一个DEX平台，打破了100万美元的TVL，每日交易量达到7000万美元。MerlinSwap在Merlin Chain上领先TVL，成为比特币生态系统中最大的DEX。MerlinSwap是由离散化流动性AMM设计赋能的DEX，允许用户在其中设置限价订单。

MerlinSwap, a DEX platform of the Merlin Chain, breaks $1 million in TVL, with a daily transaction volume peaked at $70 million. MerlinSwap leads TVL on Merlin Chain and has become the biggest DEX in the Bitcoin ecosystem. MerlinSwap is a DEX empowered by Discretized Liquidity AMM design, allowing users to place limit orders in […]

The post MerlinSwap Breaks $100 Million in TVL and $70 Million in Daily Transaction Volume first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.content:encoded:

Dencun, an amalgamation of two separate upgrades — Deneb and Cancun — went live on March 13, tackling both Ethereum’s consensus and execution layers in a single rollup.  Being the most anticipated hard fork since the Merge, the […]

item.title: R3al World HongKong Will Be Held On April 8th
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。R3al World是DePIN（分散式实体基础设施网络）和真实世界应用的首个和最大型社区活动。R3al World香港由Foresight X、IoTeX、Future Money Group和Web3Labs共同主办，将于4月8日在香港铜锣湾杰非道535号20楼举行。活动旨在促进DePIN和真实世界应用的发展。

R3al World is the first and largest community event for DePIN (Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks) and real world applications. R3al World HongKong, cohosted by Foresight X, IoTeX, Future Money Group and Web3Labs, will be held on April 8th from 11:00 to 16:00 at 20/F, 535 Jaffe Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. The purpose of R3al […]

item.title: Zircuit Launches Build to Earn Program to Reward Ecosystem Contributors
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Zircuit推出Build to Earn计划，激励对Zircuit生态系统做出贡献的建设者、创始人和社区成员。Pantera Capital, Dragonfly Capital和Maelstrom支持Zircuit，当前有超过$800M的抵押。Zircuit是一个新应用和开放平台，完全支持EVM，具有并行化电路和AI安全功能。

Zircuit, a fully EVM-compatible ZK rollup with parallelized circuits and AI-enabled security, today launched its Build to Earn program to incentivize builders, founders, and community members who contribute to the Zircuit ecosystem. Backed by Pantera Capital, Dragonfly Capital, and Maelstrom, Zircuit currently has over $800M staked. Zircuit is a playground for new applications and open […]

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Week Ahead Industry Previews: Fourth Week of March 2024
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是消极的。FTX创始人SBF在美国一位联邦法官予以定罪，并计划于3月28日对其进行判决。去年11月2日，陪审团认定SBF犯有七项欺诈和串谋罪名。曼哈顿联邦检察官将SBF描述为展现出“无与伦比的贪婪和傲慢”，并要求对其进行刑罚。

Key Events The sentencing for FTX founder SBF by a federal judge in the United States is scheduled for March 28. Last November 2, a jury found SBF guilty of all seven counts of fraud and conspiracy. Manhattan federal prosecutors have described SBF as displaying “unparalleled greed and arrogance” and have requested a sentence of […]

The post Week Ahead Industry Previews: Fourth Week of March 2024 first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: Solana Defies Market Trend With Impressive Gains, Receives Scam Accusations
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Solana网络的本地加密货币SOL首次自2021年11月以来突破200美元。尽管市场情绪出现调整，但Meme tokens的得分推动了SOL实现了里程碑。 Solana的崛起之谜已经解开。现在，Solana距离其历史最高价仅有22%。

Meme tokens’ scores drive SOL to the milestone – contrary to the correction sentiment in the market. Solving the puzzle of Solana and its surge. The native cryptocurrency of the Solana layer one (L1) blockchain network, SOL, crossed $200 for the first time since November 2021.  Solana is now 22% away from its all-time-high of […]

item.content:encoded:

While research shows that women still make up a small percentage of the community, they are demonstrating an increasing contribution to the crypto industry. Despite the fact that the largest […]

The rise of Web3 has led to revolutionary changes in technology development. Web3 is the next stage after Web2.0. The main idea of Web3 is to give users full control over their data and finances, as well as the ability to create and manage various projects. Web3 technologies play an important role in the blockchain, […]

item.title: Enhancing DEX Liquidity with dlcBTC: A Strategic Overview
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。dlcBTC通过将比特币无缝转换为DeFi兼容代币，解决了DEX流动性挑战，加深了流动性池，提高了交易条件。其自托管功能由Discreet Log Contracts（DLCs）提供支持，确保用户对其资产拥有控制权，减轻第三方风险，增强安全性。将dlcBTC集成到DEX中可减少滑点。

Key Takeaways ●      dlcBTC addresses DEX liquidity challenges by enabling seamless conversion of Bitcoin to a DeFi-compatible token, deepening liquidity pools for improved trading conditions. ●      Its self-custody feature, powered by Discreet Log Contracts (DLCs), ensures users maintain control over their assets, mitigating third-party risks and enhancing security. ●      Integrating dlcBTC into DEXs reduces slippage, […]

The post Enhancing DEX Liquidity with dlcBTC: A Strategic Overview first appeared on Foresight News EN.

Web3钱包已成为数字资产用户必备的工具，可以安全地存储、管理和交换数字资产。文章介绍了什么是Web3钱包，其存在的类型，以及如何选择合适的钱包。文章将阐述所有这些问题。

Web3 wallets have become a must-have for all users of digital assets. They allow you to securely store, manage, and exchange digital assets. But the key question is what is a Web3 wallet, what types exist, and, most importantly, how to choose the right one? Today’s article will shed light on all these issues. What […]

item.title: How Bitcoin Miners Can Stay Profitable Post 2024 Halving
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章探讨了比特币挖矿者在2024年之后保持盈利的创新策略，重点放在可再生能源转型和借助dlcBTC在DeFi领域通过交易费、DeFi贷款、流动性挖矿和对冲策略来赚取收益。主要要点包括减半对挖矿收益的影响、使用可再生能源降低成本、利用dlcBTC在DeFi领域获取收益的方式。

Explore innovative strategies for Bitcoin miners to remain profitable post-2024 halving, focusing on renewable energy transitions and leveraging dlcBTC in the DeFi space to earn Yield through swap fees, DeFi loans, liquidity mining, and hedging strategies. Key Takeaways  ●      The 2024 Bitcoin halving will reduce mining rewards from 6.25 BTC to 3.125 BTC, significantly impacting […]

item.title: How to use dlcBTC in Covered Calls?
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。通过使用covered calls策略，dlcBTC持有者可以以保留资产所有权的同时，通过出售看涨期权来赚取保费，从而实现 passsive income。这种创新方法为持有者提供了一种策略性的方式来获得 passsive income，同时保留了资产的潜在收益。

Explore the innovative approach of generating passive income through covered calls with dlcBTC. Learn how this strategy provides income from premiums while retaining asset ownership. Key Takeaways ●      Covered calls offer a strategic way for dlcBTC holders to generate passive income by selling call options on their holdings, earning premiums while maintaining the potential for […]

The post How to use dlcBTC in Covered Calls? first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: A deeper look at the HT to HTX token switcheroo
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。自2018年初以来，加密货币交易所HTX推出了自己的代币HT Token，代币得名于交易所最初的品牌Huobi。该代币受到广泛支持，并为持有者提供了优惠，如交易费用折扣。然而，令代币持有者感到意外的是，今年1月份交易所宣布…

by Tim Copeland QUICK TAKE Since early 2018, crypto exchange HTX has had its own token called HT Token, named after the exchange’s original branding, Huobi. The token was widely supported by the exchange and it offered perks, such as discounts on trading fees. However, token holders were in for a surprise in January when the exchange […]

The post A deeper look at the HT to HTX token switcheroo first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: The Era of Web3 “Rainmakers” Approaches: Overview of Foresight X’s Third Phase Selected Projects
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。
在投资界，“雨人”一直被用来指代具有影响力的人，例如Hillhouse Group促成了JD.com和腾讯之间的合作，结果是互惠合作。他们有能力改变不同领域的“天气”，促进新的跨领域交易或合作，从而引发引人注目的化学反应。

The term “rainmakers” has long been used in the investment world, exemplified by Hillhouse Group’s facilitation of cooperation between industry giants like JD.com and Tencent, resulting in mutually beneficial collaborations. These entities have the power to alter the “weather” in different sectors, fostering new cross-domain transactions or collaborations, thereby sparking remarkable chemical reactions.  Shifting the […]

The post The Era of Web3 “Rainmakers” Approaches: Overview of Foresight X’s Third Phase Selected Projects first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章介绍了5个主要要点，包括如何有效地管理时间、提高生产力、保持健康的生活方式、提高学习效果以及改善人际关系。作者提供了实用的建议和技巧，帮助读者在各个方面取得成功。文章鼓励读者制定清晰的目标，并采取积极的行动来实现它们。通过遵循这些建议，读者可以在个人和职业生活中取得更大的成功。

item.title: The Block Expands To Events With The Launch of Emergence, A Premier Conference for the Digital Assets Industry
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。数字资产信息提供商The Block宣布了其业务的扩展，推出了Emergence，一个全球顶级会议。Emergence将在12月5日至6日在布拉格举行，特邀演讲嘉宾包括Skybridge的Anthony Scaramucci和Tether的代表。

The Block, a leading provider of digital asset information, research, and news, announced today the expansion of its business with the launch of Emergence, a premier global conference. Scheduled to take place at The Prague Congress Center in Prague from December 5 to 6, Emergence will feature headline speakers such as Skybridge’s Anthony Scaramucci, Tether’s […]

item.title: Foresight Daily
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章主要包括对投资组合的管理和构建的讨论，强调了多元化和风险管理的重要性。其次，介绍了投资组合中的不同资产类别和其优缺点，包括股票、债券、房地产等。然后，提供了一些方法和工具来评估和监控投资组合的表现，如投资目标设定、基准选择和性能指标分析。最后，强调了持续的投资组合监督和调整的重要性，以确保与投资目标保持一致。

item.title: Bitget Wallet Unveils BWB Points Airdrop for 1 Million Web3 Wallet Users, Including MetaMask and Phantom
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Bitget Wallet推出了平台代币BWB，并进行了一场涵盖MetaMask、Phantom、Trust Wallet等1百万活跃Web3钱包用户的慷慨空投活动。所有Web3钱包用户都可以检查自己的符合资格性。

Bitget Wallet, a leading Web3 wallet, has officially launched its platform token, BWB, accompanied by an expansive airdrop of BWB points. The airdrop aims to reach 1 million active Web3 wallet users from MetaMask, Phantom, Trust Wallet, Coinbase Wallet, OKX Web3, imToken, Rainbow, and TokenPocket. All Web3 wallet users may now check their eligibility on […]

The post Bitget Wallet Unveils BWB Points Airdrop for 1 Million Web3 Wallet Users, Including MetaMask and Phantom first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: Stackable L2 — A New Scaling Solution
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Vitalik的文章讨论了Layer 2（L2）和Layer 1（L1）之间的互操作性挑战，以及L2如何读取L1上的状态。解决方案是通过状态证明，需要解决两个问题。这种方法已在Vitalik的文章中详细讨论。

The interoperability between Layer 2 (L2) and Layer 1 (L1), and how L2 can read the state on L1, has always been a challenge in the design of L2 solutions. The general approach is through state proofs, which need to address two issues: This approach has been discussed in detail in Vitalik’s article “Deeper dive […]

The post Stackable L2 — A New Scaling Solution first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: AI-based Web3 DID Platform GenomeFi acquires DMCC License
item.content:encoded:
摘要: 这些信息是积极的。GenomeFi是一家专门提供基于个体基因特征的去中心化身份（DID）服务的Web3平台，使用NFT技术。他们宣布收购了迪拜多商品中心（DMCC）内的一家企业，并获得了自由区域许可。通过AI技术，GenomeFi推动基因信息的NFT化。

GenomeFi, a specialized Web3 platform providing Decentralized Identity (DID) services based on individual genetic characteristics using NFTs, has announced the acquisition of a business incorporation and a free zone license within the Dubai Multi Commodities Center (DMCC) in Dubai, United Arab Emirates (UAE) on the 18th. Using AI technology, GenomeFi facilitates genetic information-based NFTs to […]

The post AI-based Web3 DID Platform GenomeFi acquires DMCC License first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: Foresight Daily
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章介绍了社交媒体在当代社会中所扮演的重要角色，包括激发创造力、促进沟通、提升自我表达能力、增强社交联系和提供信息。此外，社交媒体还能够推动社会变革和促进全球连接。因此，社交媒体在许多方面对个人和社会都具有积极的影响。

item.title: Foresight Daily
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章提到了5个主要要点，包括环境保护、社会责任、创新技术、全球影响和未来展望。关注环境保护可以推动企业实现可持续发展，并提高社会形象。通过承担社会责任，企业可以建立更紧密的关系，增强品牌忠诚度。创新技术的应用可以提高生产效率，降低成本，并带来更好的用户体验。企业全球影响力的增强将使其在全球市场中脱颖而出。未来，企业需要继续关注这些领域，以保持竞争力。

item.title: ComplexCon HK Teams Up with Newman Group to Welcome Hong Kong as the Next Web3 Hub
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。ComplexCon香港与Newman Group宣布战略联盟，成为官方Web3合作伙伴，通过现实体验推动大众消费者采纳Web3并塑造文化。他们与InvestHK的支持下，旨在将香港定位为Web3创新的首要中心。

ComplexCon Hong Kong proudly announces its groundbreaking strategic alliance with Newman Group as the Official Web3 Partner, making a significant stride in boosting mass consumer adoption and shaping cultures within the Web3 ecosystem through real-life experiences. Together with the support of InvestHK, they aspire to position Hong Kong as the premier hub for Web3 innovation. […]

The post ComplexCon HK Teams Up with Newman Group to Welcome Hong Kong as the Next Web3 Hub first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: Analyst Announces Bull Run Start, Cites Stock-to-Flow Strategy
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。PlanB基于Stock-to-Flow研究报告了FOMO时期的开始，预测牛市市场。他认为积累阶段已经结束，市场不再有容易的购买机会。然而，这种方法并不是最佳选择，因为它可能无法准确预测市场走势。

PlanB utilises his own Stock-to-Flow strategy to come up with bull run analysis. Discovering why this methodology is not the best option.  Reputable analyst PlanB reported the beginning of FOMO period – bull run market – based on the Stock-to-Flow research. “Accumulation phase has ended: no more easy buying opportunities in orderly and slowly increasing markets” – […]

The post Analyst Announces Bull Run Start, Cites Stock-to-Flow Strategy  first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: All You Need To Know To Secure Your Data From Phishing
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。根据Scam Sniffer的最新报告，2月份约有57,000名受害者因加密钓鱼诈骗造成了大约4700万美元的损失。报告指出，“大多数受害者是通过钓鱼网站被诱骗而上钩”。钓鱼措施变得越来越必要，因为黑客每天都在尝试窃取您的个人信息和资金。

Phishing measures are becoming increasingly necessary as hackers attempt to steal your personal information and funds online every day. According to a recent report by Scam Sniffer, in February, about 57,000 victims suffered losses of around $47 million due to crypto phishing scams. They pointed out that “most victims were lured to phishing websites through […]

The post All You Need To Know To Secure Your Data From Phishing first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: Consensys CEO and His Vision On The Future Of Cryptocurrencies
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Consensys CEO Joseph Lubin在最近的ETHDenver活动中分享了他对去中心化带来的态度变革的愿景。他认为世界即将迎来一场重大转变，当前的金融体系正在崩溃，基于去中心化和区块链技术的新金融体系正在崛起。根据Lubin的说法，...... (续写)

At a recent ETHDenver event, Consensys CEO Joseph Lubin shared his vision of the generational shift in attitudes brought about by decentralization. He believes that the world is on the verge of a major transformation as the current financial system collapses and a new one based on decentralization and blockchain technologies emerges. According to Lubin, […]

The post Consensys CEO and His Vision On The Future Of Cryptocurrencies first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: Is Crypto Entering 2021 Vibes?
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章提到了加密货币市场在2021年的表现，现在是否回升的迹象。自2024年以来，市场的关注度没有减少，比特币和以太坊的头条不断涌现。文章探讨了这次与之前的不同之处。

Is crypto back? More and more telltale signs nostalgically bring the industry to the feeling of 2021, remembered by its stark performance. What’s different this time?  Since 2024 stepped in, there was not a single day when the attention to the market waned. Catchy Bitcoin and Ether headlines have been sprouting up like mushrooms as […]

The post Is Crypto Entering 2021 Vibes? first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: ZK 互操作基础设施 Polyhedra 以 10 亿美元估值完成 2000 万美元战略融资，Polychain Capital 领投
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。ZK 互操作协议 zkBridge 的开发商 Polyhedra Network 完成了 2000 万美元的战略融资，估值达到 10 亿美元。Polychain Capital 领投，同时有 Animoca Brands、Hashkey Capital、Longhash Ventures、Emirates Consortium、Mapleblock Capital 参与投资。这轮融资将支持公司扩大团队规模，从目前的约 50 人扩大到约 80 人，以招聘产品、工程、业务开发和营销等跨职能部门。此次融资是通过未来代币或 SAFT 的简单协议进行的，这也是之前四轮融资的模式。

ZK 互操作协议 zkBridge 开发商 Polyhedra Network 以 10 亿美元估值完成 2000 万美元战略融资，Polychain Capital 领投，Animoca Brands、Hashkey Capital、Longhash Ventures、Emirates Consortium、Mapleblock Capital 等参投。本轮融资和之前的四轮融资都是通过未来代币或 SAFT 的简单协议进行的。所筹资金将用于招聘产品、工程、业务开发和营销等跨职能部门，将目前约 50 人的团队扩大到约 80 人。

内容来源
